message: A developer competition is willing to hold, are you interested???
name: Timeline Photos
caption:
Good News for all developers……

Marvel ALM in the cooperation with Resharper and Microsoft initiate a competition in Visual Studio 2012 using Resharper, the competition aim is to select the top three developers that can create a very small and specific MVC Web Application in the best time without using the mouse from the start to the end.

1.	First prize is a Microsoft Surface + Resharper license 
2.	Second prize is a Portable HDD 500 GB + Resharper license 
3.	Third prize is Resharper license 
4.	All winners will have certificates of their achievement.

For now, we running a survey to know if we can get the number and skills required for the competition?

If you are interested, please find the “Resharper Competition Survey” post on our Marvel ALM Facebook page, fill the survey and send it back by email to Marvel ALM email with “Resharper Competition” in the email subject, be connected to our Facebook page so you can know any news or update for this competition, job vacancies or any other news and innovative ideas that we always initiate.

Master your tools like a black belt Ninja 

Marvel ALM 
www.marvelalm.com
